messages.subject: nerikawa tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Can anyone tell me how I can get a hold of Mr. Gilbert regarding nerikawa tsuba? He seems to be the formost expert on early nihonto koshirae and I have a few
messages.messageBody:
Can anyone tell me how I can get a hold of Mr. Gilbert regarding
nerikawa tsuba? He seems to be the formost expert on early nihonto
koshirae and I have a few questions I'd like to talk with him about...
I've tried to e-mail him but I get a kickback. Any info at all would
be most welcome!! Thanks!
